transcripts.text: The way this is unfolding is like when you watch a bad horror movie.  You know exactly what will happen next because the script is so badly written.  Just in the last episode, we said that they will tell us it's all our fault, that we did not adhere to the government guidelines and instructions, and that there's now an increase in cases, and lockdown measures have to be implemented.

Midnight tonight, we are banning households meeting up indoors because we've seen that households meeting up and a lack of social distancing is one of the causes of this rising rate of coronavirus.  And we'll do whatever is necessary to keep the country safe.

Remember, this is a killer virus that came from bats and spread around the world and the only way to fight it is to be locked away like prisoners, wear masks and pay fines until a vaccine is made by a tech billionaire that predicted this will all happen.  Do you see the absurdity of this scenario?  The amount of evidence that supports the argument that this whole thing is by design is overwhelming and more scientific than the argument presented by the governments and so-called experts.  If you want to see some of this, please watch the previous episodes, which predicted week by week what will happen.  Three months in, we have not got one thing wrong to date.  Not because we are great at predicting, but rather because their script is so bad.  All you have to do is read modern history and you will see the same pattern.  This time they have technology hostage, and that has always been the last piece in the puzzle to gain total control.  Initially, this episode was supposed to be about masks, to provide some evidence of their ineffectiveness, and to show that they are nothing but a constant physical reminder of a threat and part of brutal psychological warfare.  However, I change my mind as I feel that they have us chasing our tails.  Do masks work?  Will we need gloves?  Is it now in cats?  My friends, they are just buying time, and every day that passes they are implementing new laws to enslave you under the disguise of protecting you from a killer virus.  This is only the beginning.  The next five years will be a constant attack on our lives.  What will drag us down and help them unknowingly is the conforming fearful 90% of the masses.  This is why the first step to combat this is to wake the majority up.  The only advantage we have over the generations before us is that we are better connected globally, so we can piece together the puzzle better now.  Our last hope of being connected is now under attack more than ever.  I am sure if you have been researching what is happening now, you already know.

June 4th, 2020, Amazon bans a book critical of the coronavirus lockdowns written by a conservative commentator.  May 27th, 2020, Amazon Smile won't let you give to the Family Research Council and the Alliance Defense Fund, but you can give to Planned Parenthood.  Facebook, June 19, 2020, takes down posts from President Trump's reelection campaign.  November 1, 2018, Facebook silences a pro-life organization's advertisement.  May 19, 2016, former Facebook employees admit Facebook routinely suppresses conservative views.  And I haven't even mentioned Twitter.

The tech companies have gone way too far, and we let them.  All the social media platforms ban and shadow ban anyone speaking about this.  We have been constantly banned and chased out of every platform for no good reason, because we simply question the mainstream narrative.  As The Mirror Project, we would have liked to have launched our platform by now.  However, the extreme censorship and harassment we have been experiencing has made it extremely difficult to get heard and sponsor the launch.  We want you to know that we are working on it and figuring out ways to get around all the challenges and speed up the launch.  So if you believe in the same cause, help us get the word out.

The internet, a scientific breakthrough.  far more reaching in its everyday psychological impact than any other invention since Gutenberg.  You may keep your secrets from your friends, from your parents, your children, your doctor, even your personal trainer, but it takes real effort to conceal your thoughts from Google.  And if that is true today, in future there may be nowhere to hide.

Look at the recent peaceful marches in Germany where the people collectively decided they had enough and sent a powerful message to other cities around the world.  The answer is not in rioting.  It's simply in doing the right thing to your health, your children's future and society as a whole.  Enough with the fear campaign and the attack on your subconscious mind.  These are crucial times and we have the power to stop it before it's too late.  Remember, the weapon is psychological and information is the ammunition.
